long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cloudhire Cookie Manager is an innovative Chrome extension developed by Cloudhire, a recruitment agency transforming hiring processes with cutting-edge AI. This tool enhances job application efficiency by securely capturing session cookies from selected job boards, enabling Cloudhire’s AI system to automatically apply for roles that align with the user’s profile and qualifications. It’s a streamlined solution designed for job seekers looking to maximize their reach and track their profiles seamlessly across multiple job platforms.
